blogPost.excerpt: Newny is a Live Q&A, Feedback and Insights tool made for organisations that use webinars, workshops and other forms of virtual events as a customer engagement channel.
blogPost.body: Newny is a Live Q&A, Feedback and Insights tool made for organisations that use webinars, workshops and other forms of virtual events as a customer engagement channel.
blogPost.title: Newny - Live Q&A, feedback and Insights tool for virtual events
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Newny是一款实时问答、反馈和见解工具，适用于使用网络研讨会、研讨会和其他形式的虚拟活动作为客户参与渠道的组织。
localize.tagline: 虚拟活动的现场问答、反馈和洞察工具

localize.description: Newny是一款實時問答、反饋和見解工具，適用於使用網絡研討會、研討會和其他形式的虛擬活動作爲客戶參與渠道的組織。
localize.tagline: 虛擬活動的現場問答、反饋和洞察工具

previous.excerpt: Meetcode tech interview helps companies to accelerate & scale hiring by integrating the need of face-to-face communication and key competencies evaluation, including library of 250+ questions, 20+programming languages and developers’ preferred built-in IDE.
previous.title: Meetcode - Find top developers effortlessly by online code interview

localize.description: Meetcode技术面试通过整合面对面交流和关键能力评估的需求，包括250+问题库、20+编程语言和开发人员首选的内置IDE，帮助企业加速和扩大招聘。
localize.tagline: 通过在线代码面试，毫不费力地找到顶尖的开发人员。

localize.description: Meetcode技術面試通過整合面對面交流和關鍵能力評估的需求，包括250+問題庫、20+編程語言和開發人員首選的內置IDE，幫助企業加速和擴大招聘。
localize.tagline: 通過在線代碼面試，毫不費力地找到頂尖的開發人員。

next.title:
I've never seen a book start like this:

"Many business books begin with a tacit promise: 'Let me tell you how to be like me: an unmitigated success!' Clearly, I couldn't say that."

From Hot Seat, by Jeff Immelt https://t.co/7b8D247dM3

localize.full_text:
我从未见过一本书有这样的开头。

"许多商业书籍的开头都有一个默契的承诺：'让我来告诉你如何像我一样，获得巨大的成功！' 显然，我不能这么说。"

摘自《热座》，作者：杰夫-伊梅尔特https://t.co/7b8D247dM3

我從未見過一本書有這樣的開頭。

"許多商業書籍的開頭都有一個默契的承諾：'讓我來告訴你如何像我一樣，獲得巨大的成功！' 顯然，我不能這麼說。"

摘自《熱座》，作者：傑夫-伊梅爾特https://t.co/7b8D247dM3
